argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_equvini | |- ( x = y -> E. z ( x = z /\ z = y ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_equtr | |- ( x = z -> ( z = y -> x = y ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_imp | |- ( ( x = z /\ z = y ) -> x = y ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_exlimiv | |- ( E. z ( x = z /\ z = y ) -> x = y ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_impbii | |- ( x = y <-> E. z ( x = z /\ z = y ) ) |
\
 Obsolete proof of ~ equvin as of 10-Jun-2019.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
